name: Marian's Trench
description:
A prototype entry for "My First Game Jam 2020"!

You enter the forest to re-piece together your memories. You play as a character who finds their stuffed owl who gets colder when getting nearer to certain things in the forest.

The map hasn't been fleshed out, but the prototype idea is there.

Credits:

ArowanaPrincess
BloodLagoon
Downhill2k01
Juan Gomez
MejikMahn
